faq.a:
Please submit your work report via weekly report Form as well as on the Bounty thread till the end of every week.

1. Fill out the registration application form once.
2. Kindly fill up the forms in Bitcointalk.
3. Fill in your activities in the form.

Report Example
ERC-20 Wallet Address : ________
Campaign ID: ________
Week Number: __________
Work URLs:
1. _________
2. _________
3. _________
4. _________
5. _________
There is no spreadsheet but we create https://asure.network/bounty site where you can check your shares.
You have to register for KYC / Whitelisting From and from the 1st of December you can buy tokens.

faq.q: Is KYC needed for bounty hunters?
faq.a: No. For Bounty Hunters KYC is not needed at the moment.

faq.q: When will the bounty ASR tokens be distributed?
faq.a: The distribution of the tokens to bounty participants will occur after the end (31. Dec. 2019) of TGE.

ui.name: Twitter
ui.title: Likes
ui.description: 5 likes per week of the posts on our main Twitter channel.

ui.name: Twitter
ui.title: Retweets
ui.description: 5 retweets per week of our tweets in our main Twitter channel.

ui.name: Twitter
ui.title: Posts
ui.description: 5 posts per week about our project Asure Network, telling about our vision and mentioning @AsureNetwork (our vision can be found in our Whitepaper or in our article)
rules: Link to our Whitepaper in English: https://www.asure.network/asure.network.whitepaper.en.pdf
Link to the article mentioned in the description: https://medium.com/asurenetwork/sustainability-audit-through-visions-in-blockchain-projects-aaca3b5dd5eb

ui.name: Twitter
ui.title: Comments
ui.description: 5 comments per week telling about our vision (as close to our own words as possible,  our vision can be found in our Whitepaper or in our article) and mentioning @AsureNetwork twitter.
rules: Link to our Whitepaper in English: https://www.asure.network/asure.network.whitepaper.en.pdf
Link to the article mentioned in the description: https://medium.com/asurenetwork/sustainability-audit-through-visions-in-blockchain-projects-aaca3b5dd5eb

Link to our Bounty Telegram group: https://t.me/AsureBounty

rules: Link to the "Announcement: Asure.Network TGE" article: https://medium.com/asurenetwork/announcement-asure-network-tge-995f386bf109
